name: Gloom Zombie Massacre
overview: Gloom MOD for the Amiga created by Gareth Murfin aka Alpha aka Zombie Massacre "Gloom4". Both 2 player co-op mode and 2 player combat mode are also available. In each level, your objective is to find an exit before your 3 lives run out. In specific levels, you must defeat (or escape) enemy bosses. The zombies are back in a standalone game. Zombie Massacre uses the Gloom Deluxe engine to create a first person shooter in a horror setting. Gloom’s engine can throw a lot of enemy sprites at the player, so hordes of zombies are appropriate adversaries.
